strong.span: We are ready for the future!

span.style: background: white; font-size: 18pt; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: black;
span.strong:
Founded by parents and educators in 1997,
LCCS's mission is to help students acquire the strong academic skills and deep social-emotional tools they need to be an important voice in their community.
